newFeatures: All of Melofi's features are now available for free! No more subscriptions required.
Achievements and milestones have been added! You can now earn and view them in the Insights modal.
A new 'Scene Roulette' setting is available in General Settings. When enabled, Melofi will load a different scene each time you visit.
We've introduced a brand-new onboarding experience for first-time visitors.
Melofi can now send browser notifications to keep you updated and on track.
A new 'Show Middle Clock' option has been added to General Settings. Enable it to display the clock in the center of your screen.
improvements: Changelogs are now accessible and viewable directly from the menu.
Artists can now submit their songs using the new 'Submit Song' form in the menu.
Songs are now shuffled with each visit to keep the experience fresh and varied.
bugFixes: The Insights chart now correctly displays the number of tasks completed.
The Pomodoro timer's session bell now plays at the intended times.
Ambient sounds now continue playing even when switching between scenes.

newFeatures: Lifetime users can download desktop version.
improvements: Enhanced security features to protect user data.
Updated third-party libraries to their latest versions.
bugFixes: You can now type capital M and V in the Notes widget (finally!).
Spotify search bar is now readable with crisp white text.

newFeatures: New Widgets: Youtube, Alarms, Timer, calculator, and Notes.
Can toggle between 12 and 24 hour time format by clicking on the time.
A number of new settings have been added.
Toolbar can be detached and moved around the screen.
Added hotkeys that can be viewed in the settings menu.
